 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַע‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==act as leader, lead== (?); — only Infinitive construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּפְרֹעַ‎</span> [[Judg.5.2|Judg 5:2]], see above 

 III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַע‎</span> **verb** ==let go, let alone== (Late Hebrew ***id. unbind*** (hair), ***uncover***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be empty, vacant, unoccupied*** (with <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> of thing), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***uncover***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרַע‎</span> = Late Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָרַע‎</span> [[Num.5.18|Num 5:18]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרָעֹה‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:7b»§ 7 b, c</sup>) [[Exod.32.25|Exod 32:25]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרָ֑ע‎</span> [[Lev.21.10|Lev 21:10]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרָעֵהוּ‎</span> [[Prov.4.15|Prov 4:15]] ***Infinitive cstr***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרֹע‎</span> [[Judg.5.2|Judg 5:2]] ***Participle act***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺרֵעַ‎</span> [[Prov.13.18|Prov 13:18]]; [[Prov.15.32|Prov 15:32]] ***pass***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרוּעַ‎</span> [[Lev.13.45|Lev 13:45]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרֻעַ‎</span> [[Ezek.32.25|Ezek 32:25]] — 

**1.** ***let go, let loose***, people, i.e. remove restraint from them, [[Exod.32.25|Exod 32:25]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]); compare [[Job.15.4|Job 15:4]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>JQ, July 1897, 577</sup> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְרָע‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּגְרַע‎</span>); ***unbind*** head (by removing turban, sign of mourning) [[Lev.10.6|Lev 10:6]]; [[Lev.21.10|Lev 21:10]] (forbidden to priests); also, [[Lev.13.45|Lev 13:45]] (leper), [[Num.5.18|Num 5:18]] (womsn; all with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשׁ‎</span>; see [[BDB#Now|Now]]<sup>Archaeology ii. 114</sup>; &gt; denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרַע‎</span> [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>18</sup> and others). 

**2.** ***let alone*** = avoid [[Prov.4.15|Prov 4:15]] = neglect [[Prov.1.25|Prov 1:25]]; [[Prov.8.33|Prov 8:33]]; [[Prov.13.18|Prov 13:18]]; [[Prov.15.32|Prov 15:32]] absolute = refrain [[Ezek.24.14|Ezek 24:14]]. — [[Judg.5.2|Judg 5:2]] see I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרַע‎</span>. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִדָמפּ֫רַע עָ֑ם‎</span> [[Prov.29.18|Prov 29:18]] ***the people is let loose, lacks restraint.*** **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפְרִיעַ‎</span> [[2Chr.28.19|2Chr 28:19]] ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּפְרִיעוּ‎</span> [[Exod.5.4|Exod 5:4]] — 

**1.** ***cause*** people ***to refrain***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמַּעֲשָׂיו‎</span> [[Exod.5.4|Exod 5:4]]. 

**2.** ***shew lack of restraint*** [[2Chr.28.19|2Chr 28:19]].
